snippet: The discovery of the principle behind carbon dating was reported in The New York Times two years before its remarkable implications were widely understood.
abstract: Prof Willard F Libby's discovery of carbon dating was reported in New York Times on Dec 28, 1967, two years before Dec 6, 1949 article reporting its implications and use for determining age of objects.
lead_paragraph: The discovery of the principle behind carbon dating was reported in The New York Times two years before its remarkable implications were widely understood.

headline.print_headline: Digging Up the Root of Carbon Dating
headline.main: Digging Up the Root of Carbon Dating
